page.title: 10Churches in SW Fairford
page.content: This area contains{three churches}(St Mary's Church is not in this area). They are the{Roman Catholic}and the {Congregational/Methodist}churches, built of local Cotswold stone. These are small churches.The RC church is dedicated to St Thomas of Canterbury and is served by Father Eamon McGlinchy.The usual services are held here.In the C/M church Sunday School is held each Sunday except for the monthly family service.The third church is on the{U.S.A Air Force base, and offers separate services for different denominations.At different times Military Personel living both on and off the base atend these services. Jews and black people have separate services.
